turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hey, can you check my checking account balance for account ending in 1234?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Certainly! One moment while I retrieve that information. Your checking account ending in 1234 has a balance of $542.18.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, that's lower than I thought. Can you show me the last five transactions?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, here are the last five transactions: 08/15 - $25.00 - Coffee Shop, 08/14 - $150.00 - Groceries, 08/14 - $30.00 - Gas Station, 08/13 - $10.00 - Streaming Service, 08/12 - $100.00 - Online Retailer.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Thanks. I don't recognize that $100 charge to the 'Online Retailer'. Can you give me more details about that transaction?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I am unable to provide the specific merchant details for security reasons. However, I can flag it for review by our fraud department if you suspect unauthorized activity.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, that's a bit annoying, but I understand. Yes, please flag it as potentially fraudulent. How long will that take to investigate?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I have flagged the transaction. You should receive an update from our fraud department within 2-3 business days. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
